ing: 2 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into 2 inch pieces
des: "Spicy, tangy, flavorful chicken that can be prepared in a snap! Ingredients can be adjusted to taste."
ins: Place chicken in a skillet over medium heat. Pour in lime and lemon juices, and stir in Dijon, black pepper, and Creole-seasoning. Cook, turning chicken occasionally, until the chicken pieces are done, about 15 minutes.
